s3games.engine

Class ElementType

  • java.lang.Object
    • s3games.engine.ElementType

  • public class ElementType
extends java.lang.Object
    Every movable element must have a type. Element type specifies the number of states and how the element is visualized on the board in each state.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      ImageWithHotSpot[] images
      images for all states, indexed from 0..numStates-1
      java.lang.String name
      name of the element type
      int numStates
      the number of states this element can take

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ElementType(java.lang.String name)
      construct a new element type, fill the images manually
